channel.title: Amsterdam, July 15-17 2016, Synthethings
channel.description:
Meetup for those interested in diy synthesizers, noise machines and audio gear. There is room for discussion, presentations and hands-on tinkering. Expect some soldering, patching, tweaking, and noodling of audio waves that tickle your ear.
This month we present 3 days of playing with audio stuff: Friday 15th: a meetup about the old Formant renovation project and diy synths Saturday 16th: patching circle -> Puredata, MAX/MSP, Axoloti: patch it all up! Sunday 17th: making/breaking/playing with all kinds of audio projects -> bring your own!
[url=https://radar.squat.net/en/event/amsterdam/lag/2016-07-15/synthethings][img]/uploads/default/original/2X/a/a135ae71fa2963532209c219ac805d78e7878c7a.png[/img][/url]

Meetup for those interested in diy synthesizers, noise machines and audio gear.
There is room for discussion, presentations and hands-on tinkering.
Expect some soldering, patching, tweaking, and noodling of audio waves that tickle your ear.

This month we present 3 days of playing with audio stuff:
